title: Bring the old voice back
body:
the voice right now is just horrible it just ruins the game change the voice the way it used to be please 
can i get a " change it please " if you agree

replies.body:
Im guessing you're not a Thresh player then? :P

_____

Jokes aside though, its a different voice, for like 3 days. Its not as if they permanently removed your favourite champion from the game or anything. _"Ruins the game"_ is either a wild overstatement, or you really need some more hardship in your life..

Like Talon12 says, it'll be gone in a few days.

Just enjoy the Dark Star theme while you can. 
Like the gangplank one, it's probably not coming back for the foreseeable future. 
Play a few singularity games, pick yourself up a Dark Star skin or icon.
Its a fun event. Have fun :)

It'll all be back to it's normal boring self in a couple of days. ^^

The champion voice over? Those are not changed unless rework, and besides a couple regrettable losses such as old Taric's most of the new voice overs have been straight upgrades really. But I guess it's up to tastes. However, it's unlikely that there will be a revert function for this kind of stuff.

If you're talking about other voices then I have no idea what it may be.
I would assume they are talking about the new darkstar voice set for the announcer. Which will go back to old announce on tuesday.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=74WcT2Ea,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-05-05T12:26:59.653+0000)
>
> I would assume they are talking about the new darkstar voice set for the announcer. Which will go back to old announce on tuesday.

Oh lol, I see. Thanks.
They should really keep the switch as an option.  Or sell it with darkstar thresh skin (or even sperately, DOTA does announcer voice packs).

As a thresh main I disagree wholeheartedly.
{{champion:412}}

You don't have to listen to that spooky announcer voice pack!! 

Disable it otherwise you'd get a fight like I did during first blood the other day.
Like FS Bruce said, you have the option to disable it if it's bothering you so much, I for one like a bit of change and variety for once..
You can disable it. Go to sound options and disable custom announcer or what ever its called. it's no longer on for me as it did get kind of annoying
